heya!

If I were to say that life was beating me up right now that would be
an understatement. It feels like I am barely hanging on with all the
tasks I have.

I am truly sorry I have been so slow as of late. Sometimes I only find
a day or two in a week to post in different places, and some places
have been even less.

I hope I have caught everyone up.

- Preston
